data.title: Elizabeth Hurley's Former Boyfriend's Jealous Ex-Wife Rips The Star!
data.meta_description: Elizabeth Hurley has been ripped by the jealous ex-wife of athlete Shane Warne.
data.text:
By:Radar Staff

Feb. 25 2019, Updated 11:38 a.m. ET

Getting your Trinity Audio player ready...

The ex-wife of Elizabeth Hurley's former boyfriend, cricket star Shane Warne, has blasted the actress in a new tell-all interview.

The Sun has reported that Warne's ex-wife Simone Callahan is still furious about his romance with the Austin Powers beauty, 53.

While Callahan told the newspaper that she and Warne, now 49, had agreed to end their 15-year marriage just days before he was photographed kissing Hurley in December 2010, she still was devastated by him swiftly moving on.

Article continues below advertisement

Callahan, 48, spoke out after the release of Australian cricket ace Warne's autobiography this week.

In the memoir, Warne writes, "I can honestly say that the time I had with Elizabeth were the happiest years of my life."

Remembering the incident from nearly eight years ago, Callahan told The Sun she was at home in Melbourne caring for their three children when she saw pictures of Warne online kissing Hurley.

"I only knew Liz Hurley as the funny English actress from the Austin Powers movie until I saw Shane kissing her. I had no idea he was with her in London," she said.

"I remember getting up in the morning, turning on the computer and seeing those photos.

"I was shocked and embarrassed for the children because it was so public and this was just before the holidays. It ruined our Christmas.

"Shane is a little kid, like Peter Pan, and he doesn't think about how his actions will impact other people.

Article continues below advertisement

"You would think that a mother like Liz Hurley would be more mature and respectful of my kids, but she wasn't.

"I don't believe in hatred and Â­bitterness but I do believe karma will make things right in the end."

Callahan broke her silence and told how his romance with Hurley caused her pain.

She was upset that Warne had invited Hurley to their family home.

"I know we were still together when Shane first met Liz because he called me from London that summer and told me he had spoken to her at the Goodwood races," Callahan claimed.

"I thought it was funny because we had watched her in the Austin Powers movie with the children and we all thought it was hilarious.

"Also, I've known Shane for years and she is this big movie star, so it was odd to think that he was hanging out with her.

"I remember him saying, 'I've met this girl and she is really beautiful.'"

Shane insists nothing had happened at that point but Simone says: "I don't know if he is telling the truth because I had lost trust in him by that point.

Article continues below advertisement

"Also, I was on the other side of the world."

Hurley got engaged to Warne in 2011 after divorcing husband Arun Nayar.

The sexy star, who had a son by onetime beau Steve Bing, reportedly split from Warne in 2013.
